mapper.update: update history_mouth set discharge_capacity = #{historyMouth.dischargeCapacity}, charging_capacity = #{historyMouth.chargingCapacity}, charging_current = #{historyMouth.dischargeCurrent}, battery_voltage = #{historyMouth.batteryVoltage}, discharge_current = #{historyMouth.batteryVoltage}, ambient_temperature = #{historyMouth.ambientTemperature}, internal_temperature = #{historyMouth.internalTemperature}, visitors_flowrate = #{historyMouth.visitorsFlowrate}, induction_frequency = #{historyMouth.inductionFrequency}, fillings_number = #{historyMouth.fillingsNumber}, discharge_number = #{historyMouth.dischargeNumber} where mouth_id = #{historyMouth.mouthId}
mapper.select: SELECT sum(discharge_capacity) AS discharge_capacity, sum(charging_capacity) AS charging_capacity, sum(induction_frequency) AS induction_frequency, sum(visitors_flowrate) AS visitors_flowrate, sum(fillings_number) AS fillings_number, sum(discharge_number) AS discharge_number, TRUNCATE(avg(charging_current),2) AS charging_current, TRUNCATE(avg(discharge_current),2) AS discharge_current, TRUNCATE(avg(battery_voltage),2) AS battery_voltage, TRUNCATE(avg(ambient_temperature),2) AS ambient_temperature, TRUNCATE(avg(internal_temperature),2) AS internal_temperature FROM history_mouth where device_code = #{deviceCode} and year(create_time) = #{year} and month(create_time) = #{month}
